tool.name: GNPAnnot Converter : tBlastn
tool.help:

**Program encapsulated and developed in Galaxy by Southgreen**
.. class:: infomark
**Part of the GNPAnnot Converters package**
-----
============== Author: ==============
Gaetan Droc
-----
============== What it does: ==============
Convert result in GFF3.
Create specific input to launch exonerate.
-----
============== Output format: ==============
GFF3
Tab-delimited file
-----
.. class:: warningmark
**No support website**
